attributes.action: Babies born before 24weeks get the help they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my daughter was born at 21weeks 6days she came out breathing and was not offered any help as she was born before 24weeks. i think if a baby is born breathing they should at least get the help they deserve. she was a healthy baby nothing wrong with her she was kicking away inside me as i was in labour and i think its digusting that this has not been changed before now letting mothers,fathers and family watch there baby die as if they were nothing,this needs to be changed.
